publish.title: Are you sure you want to publish this credential?
publish.text: Publishing this credential will make it accessible by all users.

unpublish.title: Are you sure to unpublish this credential?
unpublish.text: If you unpublish this credential, users will not be able to see it anymore.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?
delete.text: If you delete this credential, you will not be able to access it and this action cannot be undone.

error.toggle: An error occured, couldn't toggle credential state.
error.delete: An error occured, couldn't delete credential.
